messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
How many attacks can a creature use per round?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the limit on using the Trample attack per round?
once
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the creature's most common attack?
tentacle
You are a helpful assistant.
Can the Keeper use the tentacles every time?
no, but it's optional
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a key feature of the dark young's attacks?
It can grab investigators with its tentacles.
You are a helpful assistant.
How many thicker sinuous tentacles does a typical dark young have to attack with?
Four
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a victim being grabbed by the dark young?
They are held to one of the horrible sucking mouths and drained of 1D10+5 STR per round.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the damage bonus for the dark young's fighting attacks?
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a victim while being drained?
They are capable only of ineffectual writhing and screaming.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the damage bonus for Fighting and Trample?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the damage for Trample?
2D6 + damage bonus
You are a helpful assistant.
Why should the Idea roll be used occasionally?
Because of its far more significant effect on play compared to previous editions.
You are a helpful assistant.
What should not be asked for to uncover clues in the game?
rolls to uncover clues that you want to players to find
You are a helpful assistant.
When should the Keeper use an Idea roll?
when the players have become stuck at a point in the investigation
You are a helpful assistant.
What should be done with small skill modifiers of +5 or less?
ignored
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of a bonus die in approximating small skill modifiers?
a +1 bonus to the skill
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an Idea roll?
An Idea roll is made when the players have become stuck at a point in the investigation.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of an Idea roll?
The purpose of an Idea roll is to get the investigation back on track.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do small skill modifiers affect the roll?
Small skill modifiers (of +5 or less) may be ignored.
You are a helpful assistant.
How does a listed modifier affect the roll?
A listed modifier may cause some skill rolls to become less likely to succeed, but players now have the option to push the roll.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Idea roll used for?
The Idea roll allows the Keeper to get the investigation back on track.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do small skill modifiers work?
Where small skill modifiers (of +5 or less) are listed, these may be ignored.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do modifiers affect the likelihood of a skill roll succeeding?
A listed modifier means a –20% chance, while a bonus die means a +20% chance.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a Keeper decides to apply a modifier to a skill roll?
Either changing the difficulty level or applying a penalty or bonus die depending on the situation.
